source code.  None of these 3rd party copyright notices pertain to the /_posts/
or /images/ folders in the root of this repository.

The copyright dates have been calculated based on the date of the initial commit
and last commit year at the time the source code was referenced for re-use.

3rd party copyrights follow.  Separator provided for convenience.
